statements: SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT date, data_value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_value ASC
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM historical_data
SELECT id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM historical_data
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY data_value ASC
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value FROM historical_data WHERE date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT id, date, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) AND data_value > 100 ORDER BY id
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value, COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM historical_data GROUP BY date HAVING COUNT(id) > 1
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE value > 100;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM VisualizationProjects WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM VisualizationProjects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM HistoricalData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, id FROM HistoricalData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM VisualizationProjects WHERE project_id > 100 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE value BETWEEN 10.5 AND 20.5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, created_date FROM VisualizationProjects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, data_type, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT data_type, date_recorded FROM historical_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM historical_data;
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM historical_data GROUP BY data_type;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT data_point, trend_indicator FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2021-09-15';
SELECT data_type, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY data_type;
SELECT visualization_type, COUNT(*) AS total_visualizations FROM data_visualization GROUP BY visualization_type ORDER BY total_visualizations DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data JOIN trend_analysis ON historical_data.data_type = trend_analysis.data_point ORDER BY historical_data.date_recorded DESC;
SELECT id, date, value FROM historical_data;
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type, id FROM data_visualization ORDER BY visualization_type;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE id > 3;
SELECT dataset_name, comparison_value FROM comparison_data WHERE comparison_value < 100 ORDER BY comparison_value DESC;
SELECT id, date, value FROM historical_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, date, value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT visualization_name, visualization_type FROM data_visualization ORDER BY visualization_name DESC
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE length(trend_description) > 100
SELECT id, dataset_name, comparison_value FROM comparison_data WHERE comparison_value > 50 ORDER BY comparison_value LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM historical_data h JOIN trend_analysis t ON h.id = t.id
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM comparison_data ORDER BY comparison_date DESC;
SELECT criteria_name, comparison_value FROM comparison_data WHERE comparison_value < 50 ORDER BY criteria_name ASC;
SELECT visualization_type, data_points FROM visualization_data WHERE data_points BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY visualization_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT comparison_date, criteria_name, comparison_value FROM comparison_data WHERE comparison_value < 50.0 ORDER BY comparison_date;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis_data WHERE positive_trend = TRUE;
SELECT summary_date, summary_description FROM historical_data_summary;
